channel.title: General Music Mos Def Hip Hop Chappelles Show on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Music Mos Def Hip Hop Chappelles Show on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I thought you guys should watch this.
item.description: Mos def is one of my favorite artists and "Whats Beef" is one of my favorite songs with him and Talib Kweli. Check out the video from chappelle's show. This one is also really good. Someday i will meet mos def and i will say "Yo Mos. I really like your work" and he will look at me and say "no problem. anytime."
